title: About
text:
Welcome to my journey. A place where I document the things I’m learning, unlearning, questioning, and exploring.
I’m walking a path shaped by my think pieces, food statistics and epidemiology. Here, I dive into:

Statistics in Food — making sense of data behind what we eat and how it’s produced.
Statistics in Epidemiology & Health — understanding patterns, risks, and the numbers that influence public health decisions.
Nutritional Health — exploring how food shapes well-being, communities, and everyday choices.
Think Pieces — reflections on life, purpose, growth, and the world around me.

This blog is my evolving notebook — a place where curiosity leads, insights grow, and new interests join the journey as they come.
So… walk with me.
We’ll learn, reflect, and discover together.
